titleStmt.title: SII 14.209: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 209. (A.R. No. 641 of 1916.) ŚĒRMĀDĒVI, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE DAKSHIṆĀMŪRTI SHRINE IN THE AMMAINĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: Dated in the 5th year of Śrīvallabha who has the simple title of Tribhuvanachakravartigaḷ only, this record registers a gift of sheep by Sētuvuḍaiyāl, wife of Kuppai-Nambi, a brāhmaṇa of Śēravaṉmahādēvi-chaturvēdimaṅgalam for burning a lamp in the temple of Srīkayilāsamuḍaiya-Mahādēva in the village. These sheep to have been purchased for 90 diramam.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī. tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavatevaṟkku yāṇṭu Añcāvatu muḷḷi nāṭṭu brahmadeyam śrīcerava
ṉmātevic caturvetimaṅkalattu śrīkayilāsamuṭaiya mahādevarkku Ivvūrp pāṭakattu kuppai nampi brāhmaṇi se
tuvuṭaiyāḷ Itdevaṟkku vaitta tirununtāviḷakku Oṉṟukku vai cāvā muvāp perāṭu Aimpatuṅ kaikkoṇṭu cantrā
tittavaṟ tirununtāviḷakku nittam Uḻakku ney celuttak kaṭavomāṉom Ikkoyil śivabrāhmaṇar civaṉ cāttapirāṉ paṭṭa
ṉum Ampalavaṉ nakkapirāṉ paṭṭaṉum caṅkaranārāyaṇaṉ cakkarapāṇiyum civaṉ śrīkayilāsa muṭaiyāṉum comā
ṉ pirāṉ paṭṭaṉum Ivvaṉaivom Ikkoyil Eṅkaḷ pakkal vilai Oṟṟi taṉma tāṉamuṭaiyā
rum Ippaṭiyey celuttakkaṭavarāka cammatittom Ivvaṉaivom Ivvāṭaimpatukkum Aṉṟā
ṭu vilaikkup peciṉa tiramam toṇṇūṟum Aṟakkoṇṭu nāḷ Oṉṟukku ney Uḻakku celuttakkaṭavom I
cantirātittavaraiyum celuttukaikku tarākkutti viḷakku Eṭai patine
ṭṭum kaikkoṇṭom Ivvaṉaivom ..
Digital edition of SII 14.209 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
